title: Sampler, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, stem, overcasting, running, back, cross, and marking cross stitches with deflected element work on plain weave foundation
inscribed: Lo hizo Maria de Cos Dolores Motios y va me siendo d e dabe? 7 años
dimensions: H x W: 94 x 22.9 cm (37 x 9 in.)
description: Long vertical rectangle with horizontal bands of geometric pattern, within a curving floral border, in faded shades of blue, green, yellow, and pink on a natural ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, stem, overcasting, running, back, cross, and marking cross stitches with deflected element work on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-439.
